attributes.review:
This app was incredibly frustrating because it glitched EVERYTIME I tried to use it. I was hoping to support the campaign, but due to my experience with this app, I now firmly believe the murmurs of conspiracy I’ve been hearing for quite a time now: trump isn’t real. In fact, he is likely a scientifically constructed being derived from orange peels and pig skin. Or perhaps he is a descendant of the rodent species— this is highly probable as well. Either way he is being used as a high functioning puppet to further a fascist, white supremacist agenda. This, while a new concept to me, his former supporter, seems the most likely answer to my many queries about this “man.” 

Essentially, I warn you all against using the aforementioned application and against supporting the destruction of our country (synonymous with the trump administration)! #settleforbiden
attributes.title: Something fishy🐠🐟😤

attributes.review:
WOW!!! I was HOPING it get this app so I could destroy the libtard snowflakes!😡😡! INSTEAD I am greeted with a threat that Kermit the frog is going to come and steal away my children at night😳😳😳. I was scared, so I just closed the threat, but then all over the app, where was just pictures of an ugly old guy 🤮🤮🤮🤮!!!! He’s like really orange and has blonde hair!! Also the app sends you nonstop notifications. Im already popular enough i don’t need that💅🏼💅🏼💅🏼.Also when I downloaded it it gave me 58 viruses that were all titled “IF YOU DELETE TIKTOK YOUR APP IS GOING DOWN WITH US”.😹😼😻😻😹💫 What a coincidence, right? I can’t believe I downloaded this app. What a huge waste of my money. I’m tearing down my american flag rn because this app is so bad. acab🥰🥰🥰

I was out in the fields 🌽shootin 🔫the kids 👯‍♀️with my AK47 and a shotgun when all of a sudden I felt my left buttux gettin chomped off by somethin’!!! 😱I pulled my phone 📱out of my pocket👖 and sure enough the little Trump figure dancin 💃on the screen 📲was tryna eat my BUTTUX🍑!! I decided 🤔to let my llama 🦙Kyle handle it as he is fed all the trash 🗑anyway. But then the unimaginable happened😱!! The trump figure ATE🍽 KYLE🦙, THE ❌INDESTRUCTIBLE❌LLAMA🦙!! Now what am I gunna shoot🔫 at when the kids run out😤??!! So I took the phone 📱and what was left of Kyle 🦙and shoved it in the toilet🚽. attributes.review: Listen this country needs a leader who knows what hers doing and doesn’t have a country be held by threads and say “it’ll go back to normal,  it’ll be a miracle.” And in my lifetime I have never seen anyone more ignorant, disrespectful and racist. He did nothing about COVID-19 and said that George Floyd should be proud to have died for the country. Trump is a business man (he’s not even good at that . He’s millions of dollars in debt.) and he should stay out of our government and stop ruining the land of the free and the home of the brave. Trump should be never seen again in the White House and I fact he should have been out of the months ago from using hush money. Like the government isn’t a lunch-table where you can pay people to get what want. Trump, I hope deep down in my heart that you lose this election and fall from your pathetic reign over America.
attributes.title: Trump 🤮

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to honor the amazing Cheeto man 👱‍♂️but did not expect what was about to happen. Immediately after opening the app I was consumed by the urge to go for a walk so I did. As I walked 🏃🏽‍♀️down the street I felt the need to stop, so I did that’s where I saw it😮.... I looked to my left towards a dumpster and saw a bag of Cheetos I felt drawn towards it I then picked it up and took it back home at this point I was no longer in control it was like I was set to some type of auto pilot. Once I got inside I took the bag of Cheetos and smashed them into powder I grabbed a pair of swimming goggles put them on and began to roll around in the Cheeto dust. I stood up after about 30 minutes in the Cheeto dust and looked in the mirror... I screamed in horror I then realized I was as orange as the Cheeto man himself 🙎‍♀️. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. IT WILL TAKE YOU OVER AND DESTROY YOUR LIFE.
attributes.title: This is Outrageous!!!

attributes.review: I was trying to use this app but it made my whole phone glitch out. Meanwhile my dog is outside and got ran over by a submarine. I go outside, scoop up my dog and bring her inside to see what I could do. I wanted to look up “what to do when your dog gets ran over by a submarine” but because I was using the app ( while answering weird questions like my age, cup size, hair color and length etc.) and it screwed up my phone, I couldn’t save my dog. I turned my phone on and off again, went to the app once more and hit “ contact” so I could complain about my inconvenience 🙄 and it took me to a website that was only pictures of anime girls with huge knockers and the face of Danny Divito edited on. Idk what’s wrong with this app but don’t download it. It’ll kill your dog and then make you question your sexual preferences.
attributes.title: Worst app ever- my dog died

attributes.review: This app downloaded a virus on my phone. every time i open my phone all i would see is middle aged moms with anti-vax children screaming “TRUMP 2020!!!!” which caused me to go deaf and i now have to wear a hearing aid. this app took so long to load it made my eyes weak starring at the loading screen and it waisted so much of my time i could have used to sign petitions and go to BLM protests. the app lags so much and i could barely stay on for more than 5 minutes without it bugging out and crashing on me. do NOT download this app it is a waste of time and data and it negatively effects your eye sight from starring at something so hideous and disgusting and can cause ear infections and/or deafness from hearing the voice of a tyrant racist registered sex offender that doesn’t know how to properly do his job or use his brain to “make america great again”
